original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 782: Nitric — In Search of the Right Knob
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and David Ruggles chat with Rak Siva and Steve Demchuck to talk about Nitric! Thats the Infrastructure from Code framework that makes it easy to use a cloud back-end in your code, using any of multiple providers, in multiple programming languages.
The group chatted about the role and form of good documentation, as well as whether a Contributor License Agreement is ever appropriate, and what a good CLA would actually look like. Dont miss it!


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right in the Hackaday Discord? Have someone youd like use to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us!

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: Nitric: クラウドバックエンドをコードで簡単に使用する
body: Jonathan BennettとDavid RugglesはRak SivaとSteve DemchuckとNitricについて話をします。クラウドバックエンドをサポートするCodeフレームワークについて議論し、文書化やCLAの役割、良いCLAの例にも触れました。Hackaday Discordで動画を見ることができます。
titles: Nitric: クラウドバックエンドをコードで簡単に使用する
ドキュメンテーションの役割と重要性
コントリビューターライセンス契約（CLA）の適切なあり方
Hackaday Discordでライブ録画鑑賞可能
